configuration.name: widget_07707856221305918
configuration.stem: A scientist knows that a molecule of DNA is 27% cytosine. What else does the scientist know about the DNA molecule? Choose the correct answer.

feedBack.finalWrongHint: Cytosine pairs with guanine, so if there is 27% cytosine then there is also 27% guanine.

options.name: mc-opt-item-06761015402153134x1
options.hint: Which base does cytosine pair with? How are the proportions of paired based related?
